duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform risk assessments & consulting for enterprise networks & infrastructures.
Understand networking standards, such as DNS, DHCP, TCP/IP, HTTP, JSON.
Work with regulatory frameworks such as ISO 27001, FedRAMP, PCI, and HIPAA.
Experience with various cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, & GCP.
Possess relevant cloud & security certifications such as CISSP, CCSP, Cloud+, CCSK or others.
Have detailed technical knowledge of cloud infrastructure and tools such as; AWS, Terraform and Ansible.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field (Master's preferred)
